players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I believe we need to be vigilant and keep a close eye on each other tonight. With one of us already eliminated, it's important that we work together to identify the mafia."

You: "I agree with Bob. Let's all be cautious and pay attention to each other's actions and words during the day. At night, let's try to get some rest and trust that our detective will do their job well."

Diana: "I think we should focus on identifying any inconsistencies or suspicious behavior in each other's actions and words during the day. At night, let's try to get some rest and trust that our detective will do their job effectively."

Diana: "I believe that we should all remain vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and words during the day. It's important that we work together to identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behavior, as this will help us narrow down the potential mafia among us."

You: "I think we should all focus on observing each other's actions and words carefully during the day. Let's try to identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behavior, as this will help us narrow down the potential mafia among us."

Bob: "I believe that we should all remain focused on observing each other's actions and words carefully during the day. Let's continue to work together to identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behavior, as this will help us narrow down the potential mafia among us."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe we need to be vigilant and keep a close eye on each other tonight. With one of us already eliminated, it's important that we work together to identify the mafia."

You: "I believe that we should all remain focused on observing each other's actions and words carefully during the day. Let's continue to work together to identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behavior, as this will help us narrow down the potential mafia among us."

Alice was arrested
